Topic.Title: Fueling a Nuke carrier, or allowing the State department to build Mosques with taxpayer money

Message.Msg: Yes — and to rebuild historic churches and temples as well. The State Department’s program to preserve overseas cultural landmarks started funding projects under President Bush in 2001. FULL QUESTION A mass e-mail sent out by the Christian, conservative American Family Association claims that Obama is giving foreign aid to overseas mosques. Obama gives your tax dollars to rebuild Muslim mosques around the world. While millions of Americans struggle to keep their homes and jobs, President Barack Obama can’t give your tax dollars away fast enough. ⬐ Click to expand/collapse the full text ⬏ FULL ANSWER Although this chain e-mail first appeared months ago, we have received a large number of inquiries about it recently, as Congress debates cuts in federal spending. It started when the American Family Association sent an e-mail to supporters and posted an item on its website claiming that "Obama gives your tax dollars to rebuild Muslim mosques around the world." The message points to a State Department document that lists recipients of the U.S. Ambassadors Fund for Cultural Preservation Awards in 2010. According to the State Department website, the Ambassadors Fund for Cultural Preservation "provides direct grant support for the preservation of cultural sites, cultural objects, and collections, as well as forms of traditional cultural expression, in eligible countries around the world." U.S. ambassadors nominate projects to be funded. But the program isn’t the brainchild of President Barack Obama.

Topic.Title: Obama was nowhere to be found during the Benghazi attack

Message.Msg: They were meeting when it happened, Obama gave him his orders and he went to work. That's how it works. What decision do you think Obama was needed for after that? What could he have done that could have made anything different? Stevens was dead before anything could have been done and that attack was over. The second one was hours latter. Panetta testified that the white house was in contact throughout. If Panetta had needed him he would have been able to contact hm. Presidents don't micro manage battlefields. Do you think Bush was up for every battle in Iraq? Where was Reagan when soldiers were using there cell phones to call in artillery in Grenada because normal communications didn't work? Admit it you are just trying to making an issue where none exists. It only makes you look ignorant about how both the government and the military work. Your constant fictions are worth a big yawn and only those who really want to believe anything bad possible about Obama are going to sympathize with your outlandish positions.
